(:action add
    :parameters (?p - player ?l - location ?item - object ?container - object ?condition - predicate)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (not (added ?item ?container)) ?condition)
    :effect (and (added ?item ?container))

(:action drain
  ; Drain a resource and update its state
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?entity - resource)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (processed ?entity))
  :effect (and (drained ?entity) (not (wet ?entity))

(:action cook ; Cook a food item using a specific tool and update its status
  :parameters (?p - person ?l - location ?item - object ?tool - tool)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (prepared ?tool))
  :effect (cooked ?item ?tool))
